short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to identify fonts & stlyes used by a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

Instant Code Formatting: Beautify your code with a single click, saving time and improving readability.

Multi-Language Support: Supports a wide range of popular languages including JavaScript, TypeScript, React, HTML, XML, GraphQL, and SQL.

User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use design that integrates smoothly into your workflow.

On-the-Go Convenience: Format code instantly wherever you are, right from your browser.
